welcome_message_body: Welcome to Burnley, a charming town known for its rich industrial heritage and stunning countryside. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore everything this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Jet2 Terminal
terminals.description: The Jet2 terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is dedicated to flights operated by Jet2 airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, featuring state-of-the-art facilities and serving primarily low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a limited number of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.
